Recapturing the property tax for its primarily intended purpose will save the state money because the things you do at the local level you can do more efficiently. Treasurer Bill Lockyer , a supporter of Jerry Brown 's proposal, described redevelopment agencies as "vampire agencies" because they are "sucking the blood of everybody around them for their own particular purposes."
